entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7 except minus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 3 April 2023
